entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `FieldAttributes.NotSerialized` has been marked obsolete #68626
  • Pull members up in roslyn LSP #68621
  • Using primary constructors reports erroneous NRT warnings in some cases. #68616
  • False positive IDE0059 with anonymous types #68611
  • Escape scope analysis won't work with primary constructors #68610

Closed

  • Go-to definition doesn't work anymore on project references #68472
  • [BUG] cannot rename symbols across projects #68593
    Preview 1.1
  • `[MaybeNull]` does not work for parameters #68609
  • C# Interactive UnauthorizedAccessException #68606
  • IDE0060 (remove unused parameter) reported for primary constructor parameters. #68501
  • Incorrect IDE0045 simplified if expression #68578

PullRequests

Created

  • VisualStudioProjectFactory: import the solution service once instead … #68630
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Implement "extension invocation" section for methods #68629
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add EA package for the compiler developer SDK #68628
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Suppress formatter-based serialization warnings in MetadataWriter #68627
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations in ArrayBuilder.AddMany #68625
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Add PrivateAnalyzers helper assembly #68623
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Use primary constructors in the 'Features' layer. #68622
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update references to constant fields in parameter initializers when moving to primary constructors. #68620
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Convert xml references when moving to primary constructors #68615
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations in MergedNamespaceSymbol.SlowGetChildNames #68614
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Address a prototype comment #68613
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Enhance the SARIF v2 log to report analyzer execution time #68607
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • NPM packaging improvements, shared dependencies #68603
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Adjust edit span for LSP completion when triggered in the middle of a word #68624
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Prevent `EditAndContinueFeedbackDiagnosticFileProvider` from throwing an exception in Razor scenarios #68619
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Switch to primary constructors in IDE layer #68299
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Improve collection literal parsing #68561
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Revert 68576 #68618
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Fix 'use primary constructor' in the presence of directives #68612
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Move to newer CodeStyle, dotnet-format and compiler toolset NuGet packages #68608
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Use GetContainingLineNumber() to reduce allocations #68605
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix issues with 'use conditional' when using pattern variables #68604
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • [17.6] Ignore source generator diagnostics outside compilation #68488
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update handling of collection literals with no target type #68598
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix inserting new values with source generators #68451
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged
  • Don't rebind object initializer parents #68449
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Generic interceptors #68602
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Correct interpolated string addition parts counting #68562
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Handle folders in source-generated file paths #68494
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Refactor BindExtensionMethod method and add some assertions #68599
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Flesh out implementation of ref-safety rules for inline array operations. #68597
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Run suppressors insofar as there are suppressible errors #62641
    Area-Compilers, Blocked, 17.5
  • Add and emit ref kind for ref readonly parameters #68179
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0
  • EnC: Stop reporting CS7101 on runtime that supports generic updates #68601
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
